components.content: .live_icon { width: 12vw; max-width: 170px; display: block; margin-top: 0.5rem } .hoiKv__Components .hoiHeadline { position: absolute; top: 4vw; left: 4vw; } @media screen and (max-width: 768px) { .hoiKv__Components .hoiHeadline { top: 10vw; left: 10vw; } .live_icon { width: 90px; margin-top: 0.75em; } } .hoiKv { position: relative; } .hoiKv__Media:after { padding-bottom: 23.89% !important; } @media screen and (max-width: 768px) { .hoiKv__Media:after { padding-bottom: 128.4% !important; } .hoiKv__MediaImage { background-image:url('https://images.samsung.com/is/image/samsung/assets/uk/explore/kings-cross/samsung-people-live/s21-mob.jpg') !important; } } .hoiBreadcrumbs__Link { color: white !important; letter-spacing: 1px; }

text: Bring the showroom experience to your living room with our series of live and interactive demonstrations, direct from Samsung KX. Ask questions, get exclusive offers, and more.
